title: What was the change to placement MMR?
body:
I had to play an extra placement match and went from gold 1 to silver 4.
What did they change?

replies.body:
The initial flex placements were screwed up, and seeing bronze placed in plat and chall placed in bronze, with games having a mixture of everyone in-between.

They fixed it up so that players _actually_ had a soft rest that was based on their solo MMR. Unfortunately, this resulted in many players that placed higher during the time of screw-up being booped far below the screw-up placements. It doesn't matter though, from what I have seen on your match history, you are a pretty good player and will likely get out of silver pretty quick.
